choices: Yes, let's go with the kongs
I dunno this idea might be better
1.content:
Alright so here we are getting ready to move on with this story. Here you can be any of the kongs, the kremlings or the tikis. You could follow my idea or make up your own. Be sure to follow the rules. Heck even some fan characters could be used in this story.

So what's its gonna be? Are you ready to go?
1.title: Setting up

11.content: Alright let's see here... We have have the big bloke himself Donkey Kong, his buddy Diddy Kong, Dixie Kong and there are some more listed here. All of them are ready to roll. Which one are you gonna go with?
11.title: Which Kong?

111.content:
Donkey Kong is now resting in his hut as the sun is starting to rise high in the sky and he stretches out a bit before letting out a good long yawn. He hops out of his hut and heads to the cave where his banana pile is. He picks one off of the pile and takes a quick bite from it and expecting a delicious flavor but as he chews on it he finds it rather lacking in taste and it melts away in his mouth! His eyes go wide from this discovery! But he scratches his head as he doubts that could be true for the other bananas and he picks up a second one and takes a bite out it... It lacks flavor and it dissolves in his mouth! He couldn't believe what was happening but it was! He tried a third one but the same thing happened! He tried again and yielding the same results!

The ape couldn't comprehend nor would he wanted to! He beats his chest a few times and hollers angrily at the sky to vent his frustration. After that outburst he rubs his head a few times before spotting a couple of kritters outside and they yelp from surprise and run off to Jungle Japes.
111.title: Tainted Banana Horde

1111.content: Without thinking too much the ape dashes off and leaving the pile of tainted bananas behind to go after the walking handbags. Donkey Kong hollers in anger as he pursues the kritters but they split up and the gorilla stops at the point where they separated. He scratches his head a few times before his belly lets out a low grumble and he blinks a few times and groans from it being empty. He lets out a small sigh and looks at the two sets of footprints... One left to the deeper part of the jungle while the other one was heading to a lake. The ape shakes his head a few times before beating his chest a few times getting himself ready to take on what was in store for the path that he took.
1111.title: Going Solo

choices: miniature humans previously undiscovered on the other side of the island.
112.content:
The little buddy of Donkey Kong was helping his "mentor" forage for bananas to add to the horde. Suddenly Diddy Kong got hungry for something else.

He goes off to find other food. He didn't tell DK, but he figured he would understand.

What does he find?
112.title: Diddy Kong

choices: Go with one of the other Kremlings
Nah let's see the other baddies

12.title: Kremling time

122.title: The other kremlings

1221.title: Kremling Group

1222.title: Going solo

info.brief_description: The world of Donkey Kong Gone Vorish
info.description:
Here we have DK and the others having a good time when suddenly the bananas had lost their filling and leaving those ate them not to be full from them... Or something along those lines.

Here are some rules for this story.

1. Soft vore is allowed but hard vore isn't
2. Sex is fine M/M , M/F and F/F
3. Some fighting is ok but don't go overboard with it
4. Alternative vore are allowed (Anal, Cock, Unbirth or other)
5. The story can start from anywhere along the DK Universe
6. Please put some effort in the chapters and not having them with one sentence or line. The exceptions are with making choices at the begining.
7. Scat is allowed but don't do anything nasty with it.
8. The story will end if the main character is eaten and digested.
9. This story will be in third person.
That's all I have to say for now. Enjoy!
